lines.text: I'm so upset, I'd cry, but my tear ducts haven't worked since my last eye job.
You know, I once built a castle out of Spam.
Wherever the informant leads, it is our responsibility to follow him in a fluid moving perimeter.
God, I'm really good. Those "Charlie's Angels" reruns are starting to pay off.
Why are you always in black?

[about the Flints]
What would they do without me?

[through an intercom in his kitchen]
Lizzie, are you milking the cow? My ulcer's doing a tango up here.

[to Mrs. Flint]
Why can't your plastic surgeon give the stock market a lift?
[Rips the duct tape off Patti's mouth]
Happy to see you too Patti.
Got into a fight with a dumpster and lost.
